resource-agent.name: fence_idrac

symlink.name: fence_imm
symlink.shortdesc: Fence agent for IBM Integrated Management Module

resource-agent.longdesc: fence_ipmilan is an I/O Fencing agentwhich can be used with machines controlled by IPMI.This agent calls support software ipmitool (http://ipmitool.sf.net/). WARNING! This fence agent might report success before the node is powered off. You should use -m/method onoff if your fence device works correctly with that option.
